headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: rule_id
parameters.description: ID of the rule that you want to bind objects to.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: Category of the object. Enum values: CAMPAIGN , ADGROUP , AD .

parameters.name: dimension_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the objects that you want to bind to the rule.

parameters.name: bind_type
parameters.description: Whether you want to bind objects to a rule or unbind objects from a rule. Enum values: BIND , UNBIND .

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language of the returned messages. Enum values: ZH (Simplified Chinese), EN (English)(default), JA (Japanese).
